message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this valuable product to you today. I think it would be perfect for your needs. I'm asking for $200 to start. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While $120 is a bit too low for me, I'm willing to come down to $180. I believe this product is worth the value it will bring you.
I'm still interested in the product, but I'm not sure I can go up to $180. Would you be willing to meet me at $150?
